author: rooneg
msg: Add cancellation support to 'svn commit'. Part of issue #1004.
(harvest_commitables): take client context argument, and if the context
contains a non-null cancel_func, use it to check for cancellation.
svn_client__get_copy_committables): take client context argument, pass it
(do_item_commit, svn_client__do_commit): if the client context has a
cancel_func, use it to check for cancellation.
